details:
noun
- primary social group
= synonyms: family unit
- people descended from a common ancestor
= example: people descended from a common ancestor
= synonyms: folk
- a collection of things sharing a common attribute
= synonyms: class
- a social unit living together
= example: a social unit living together
= synonyms: house
- (biology) a taxonomic group containing one or more genera
= example: (biology) a taxonomic group containing one or more genera
- an association of people who share common beliefs or activities
= example: an association of people who share common beliefs or activities
= synonyms: fellowship
- a loose affiliation of gangsters in charge of organized criminal activities
= synonyms: mob, crime syndicate, syndicate
- a person having kinship with another or others
